entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @jaketapper There are no words for the irresponsible, propaganda style behavior around coronavirus in American society. Just tell the truth about what's happening with virus Mr Trump, why is it necessary to lie instead of save your citizens that voted for you?? Please stop the lies, please.
